title: Newbie Help
body: Hey guys any tips on who I should be using, its only my 3rd day in the game, at the moment im mainly using Dariun think im catching on pretty quick only having 2 losses but deaths are up there. Any general advice also appreciated, thanks

replies.body:
Hey fireandice1194,


As this is the Help & Support sub-boards, we typically only answer general questions and technical issues related to League of Legends. As such, I'd like to direct you to post in the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy)boards because this seems like a question regarding champion/game advice.

By the way, welcome to the League of Legends! ;)
